<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given a compound construct with a set of clauses, generate the list of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constituent leaf constructs, each with a list of clauses that apply to it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: Clauses that are not originally present, but that are implied by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OpenMP spec are materialized, and are present in the output.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: Composite constructs will also be broken up into leaf constructs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If composite constructs require processing as a whole, the lists of clauses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for each leaf constituent should be merged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIRSTPRIVATE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;5.2:112:5-7&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Directives: distribute, do, for, parallel, scope, sections, single, target,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// task, taskloop, teams</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;5.2:340:3-20&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (3) The effect of the firstprivate clause is as if it is applied to one or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// more leaf constructs as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  (5) To the distribute construct if it is among the constituent constructs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  (6) To the teams construct if it is among the constituent constructs and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      distribute construct is not;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  (8) To a worksharing construct that accepts the clause if one is among the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      constituent constructs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  (9) To the taskloop construct if it is among the constituent constructs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (10) To the parallel construct if it is among the constituent constructs and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      neither a taskloop construct nor a worksharing construct that accepts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      the clause is among them;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (12) To the target construct if it is among the constituent constructs and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      the same list item neither appears in a lastprivate clause nor is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      base variable or base pointer of a list item that appears in a map</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      clause.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (15) If the parallel construct is among the constituent constructs and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// effect is not as if the firstprivate clause is applied to it by the above</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rules, then the effect is as if the shared clause with the same list item is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// applied to the parallel construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (17) If the teams construct is among the constituent constructs and the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;5.2:340:21-30&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (21) The effect of the lastprivate clause is as if it is applied to all leaf</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constructs that permit the clause.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (22) If the parallel construct is among the constituent constructs and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// list item is not also specified in the firstprivate clause, then the effect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the lastprivate clause is as if the shared clause with the same list item</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is applied to the parallel construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (24) If the teams construct is among the constituent constructs and the list</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// item is not also specified in the firstprivate clause, then the effect of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lastprivate clause is as if the shared clause with the same list item is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// applied to the teams construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (27) If the target construct is among the constituent constructs and the list</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// item is not the base variable or base pointer of a list item that appears in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a map clause, the effect of the lastprivate clause is as if the same list</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// item appears in a map clause with a map-type of tofrom.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (36) The effect of the reduction clause is as if it is applied to all leaf</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constructs that permit the clause, except for the following constructs:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  (1) The parallel construct, when combined with the sections,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      worksharing-loop, loop, or taskloop construct; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  (3) The teams construct, when combined with the loop construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (4) For the parallel and teams constructs above, the effect of the reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clause instead is as if each list item or, for any list item that is an array</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// item, its corresponding base array or base pointer appears in a shared clause</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for the construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (6) If the task reduction-modifier is specified, the effect is as if it only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// modifies the behavior of the reduction clause on the innermost leaf construct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that accepts the modifier (see Section 5.5.8).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (8) If the inscan reduction-modifier is specified, the effect is as if it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// modifies the behavior of the reduction clause on all constructs of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// combined construct to which the clause is applied and that accept the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// modifier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (10) If a list item in a reduction clause on a combined target construct does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not have the same base variable or base pointer as a list item in a map</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clause on the construct, then the effect is as if the list item in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reduction clause appears as a list item in a map clause with a map-type of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tofrom.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> C, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> H&gt;</span></CodeLine>
